title: Ewell
summary: Ewell (/ˈjuːəl/ (listen) YOO-əl, inf. /ˈjuːl/ YOOL) is a suburban area with a village centre in the borough of Epsom and Ewell in Surrey, approximately 13 miles (21 km) south of central London and 1.5 miles (2.4 km) northeast of Epsom. In the 2011 Census, the settlement had a population of 34,872, a majority of which (73%) is in the ABC1 social class, except the Ruxley Ward that is C2DE.[2]
